attributes.action: T. Blair should be punished for killing Iraqis and deceiving his own countrymen
attributes.background: Iraq war. It resulted in loss precious of human lives. The prime minister of the time had deceived the public by twisting the facts for American  interest. And he should be held responsible so that no other prime minister could follow the same path to start another war.

rejection.details:
If you want Parliament to hold Mr Blair to account, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/159996
